question: The overall content of the poem can best be describe by which statement?
choice1: The characteristics of a drop of dew are related to those of the human soul.
choice2: The life cycle of a drop of dew is contemplated.
choice3: The human soul is shown to be a drop of dew.
choice4: The physical characteristics of dew are analyzed.

question: Which of the following sets of adjectives is best suited to describing the poem’s tone?
The speaker’s metaphor for the human body is ______.
The poem contains: I. A biblical allusion, II. An extended metaphor, III. An evocation of spiritual longing
In the final four lines of the poem the poet suggests that _______.
choice1: The dew drop will ultimately be destroyed by the sun
choice2: The drop of dew will return to earth in the form of “manna”
choice3: Souls as pure as a drop of dew will ascend to heaven
choice4: Death brings spiritual unity with God
